statements: SELECT * FROM cell_types ORDER BY cell_id DESC;
SELECT cell_type, gene_expression_level FROM cell_types WHERE cell_id = 100;
SELECT cell_id, cell_type FROM cell_types WHERE gene_expression_level >= 0.5;
SELECT * FROM cell_types WHERE cell_type LIKE 'neuron%';
SELECT AVG(gene_expression_level) AS average_expression FROM cell_types;
SELECT cell_id, cell_type, gene_expression_level FROM cell_types WHERE gene_expression_level > 0.5 ORDER BY cell_id DESC
SELECT * FROM cell_types WHERE cell_type = 'Neuron' AND gene_expression_level < 0.3
SELECT cell_id FROM cell_types WHERE cell_type = 'Fibroblast' OR cell_type = 'Lymphocyte' ORDER BY cell_type, cell_id
SELECT AVG(gene_expression_level) AS average_expression FROM cell_types WHERE cell_id IN (1, 3, 5) GROUP BY cell_type
SELECT DISTINCT cell_type, COUNT(*) AS total_cells FROM cell_types GROUP BY cell_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_cells DESC
SELECT * FROM CellTypes
SELECT cell_type_name, gene_expression_data FROM CellTypes
SELECT disease_name FROM Diseases
SELECT cell_type_name, gene_expression_data FROM CellTypes WHERE cell_type_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM Diseases WHERE disease_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001'
SELECT * FROM CellTypes WHERE cell_type_name = 'Neuron';
SELECT cell_type_name, gene_expression_data FROM CellTypes;
SELECT * FROM Diseases WHERE disease_name LIKE '%cancer%';
SELECT disease_name, associated_cell_type_id FROM Diseases ORDER BY disease_name ASC;
SELECT disease_name, cell_type_name FROM Diseases JOIN CellTypes ON Diseases.associated_cell_type_id = CellTypes.cell_type_id;
SELECT * FROM CellTypes;
SELECT cell_type_name, cell_type_description FROM CellTypes;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM GeneExpression WHERE expression_level > 0.5;
SELECT disease_name, associated_genes FROM DiseaseMechanisms;
SELECT * FROM CellTypes WHERE cell_type_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM CellTypes WHERE cell_type_id = 1;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM GeneExpression ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT disease_name, related_cell_types FROM DiseaseMechanisms WHERE disease_id = 3;
SELECT gene_name, cell_type_name FROM GeneExpression INNER JOIN CellTypes ON GeneExpression.cell_type_id = CellTypes.cell_type_id;
SELECT disease_name, COUNT(associated_genes) AS num_genes FROM DiseaseMechanisms GROUP BY disease_name HAVING num_genes > 5;
SELECT * FROM CellType;
SELECT gene_name, gene_symbol FROM Gene;
SELECT cell_type_name, cell_type_id FROM CellType ORDER BY cell_type_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Expression WHERE expression_level > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM DiseaseMechanism LIMIT 3;

SELECT CellType.cell_type_name, Gene.gene_name, Expression.expression_level FROM CellType JOIN Expression ON CellType.cell_type_id = Expression.cell_type_id JOIN Gene ON Expression.gene_id = Gene.gene_id;

SELECT Gene.gene_symbol, Expression.expression_level, CellType.cell_type_name FROM Gene JOIN Expression ON Gene.gene_id = Expression.gene_id JOIN CellType ON Expression.cell_type_id = CellType.cell_type_id;

SELECT CellType.cell_type_name, Gene.gene_name, Expression.expression_level FROM Expression JOIN Gene ON Expression.gene_id = Gene.gene_id JOIN CellType ON Expression.cell_type_id = CellType.cell_type_id;

SELECT Gene.gene_symbol, Expression.expression_level, CellType.cell_type_name FROM Expression JOIN CellType ON Expression.cell_type_id = CellType.cell_type_id JOIN Gene ON Expression.gene_id = Gene.gene_id;

SELECT Expression.expression_level, Gene.gene_name, CellType.cell_type_name FROM Expression JOIN CellType ON Expression.cell_type_id = CellType.cell_type_id JOIN Gene ON Expression.gene_id = Gene.gene_id;
SELECT * FROM CellTypes;
SELECT cell_type_name, cell_type_description FROM CellTypes WHERE cell_type_id = 1;
SELECT gene_name, gene_symbol FROM Genes ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT gene_name, gene_description FROM Genes WHERE gene_symbol = 'ABC';

SELECT cell_type_name, gene_name, expression_level FROM CellTypes JOIN ExpressionLevels ON CellTypes.cell_type_id = ExpressionLevels.cell_type_id JOIN Genes ON ExpressionLevels.gene_id = Genes.gene_id;
SELECT * FROM Genes WHERE gene_id = 1;
SELECT gene_name, gene_symbol FROM Genes ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT cell_type_name, gene_name, expression_level FROM CellTypes INNER JOIN ExpressionLevels ON ExpressionLevels.cell_type_id = CellTypes.cell_type_id WHERE expression_level > 0.5;
SELECT DISTINCT cell_type_name FROM CellTypes INNER JOIN ExpressionLevels ON ExpressionLevels.cell_type_id = CellTypes.cell_type_id WHERE gene_name LIKE 'A%';

SELECT mechanism_name, AVG(association_strength) AS avg_strength FROM DiseaseMechanisms INNER JOIN MechanismAssociations ON MechanismAssociations.mechanism_id = DiseaseMechanisms.mechanism_id GROUP BY mechanism_name HAVING avg_strength > 0.6;
